reviewText: The Aura 3-D sound on this disc is awesome!

Amazing sounding cool mixes, really rock my LFE and make all my 7 channels (I upmix from 5.1) sound full range. Also uses the back channeles aggressively, but NOT gimmicky, which I like. Very cool blu ray for audio and nice slip cover. Also love that it comes with different layer of PCM OR DTS-HD OR lossless 96/24 stereo...and there's differnet song versions/remixes on different codecs! Never seen that before, very cool! I think PCM track with original album is best IMO however.
